hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well MQ GS Basement: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Hand Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Farore's Wind#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Prescription#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
